title: Respond to a Rental Inquiry
description: A prospective tenant has inquired about a vacant unit via a rental website. The agent must respond and encourage them to apply.

tasks.description: Receive the inquiry, noting the prospect's name and the property they are interested in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the prospect and property.

tasks.description: Check the availability of the unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the unit is still available.

tasks.description: Send a templated response that answers any questions, provides a link to the online application, and invites them to schedule a showing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a prompt, informative, and helpful response.
